verses.verse: Now it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> as <S%H834><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> in his house, <S%H1004><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Nathan <S%H5416><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> Lo, <S%H2009><s%> I <S%H595><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in a house <S%H1004><s%> of cedars, <S%H730><s%> but the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> remaineth under <S%H8478><s%> curtains. <S%H3407><s%>

Then Nathan <S%H5416><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> Do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in thine heart; <S%H3824><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is with <S%H5973><s%> thee.

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> night, <S%H3915><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Nathan, <S%H5416><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Go <S%H1980><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> <S%H413><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my servant, <S%H5650><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Thou <S%H859><s%> shalt not <S%H3808><s%> build <S%H1129><s%> me a house <S%H1004><s%> to dwell in: <S%H3427><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I have not <S%H3808><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in a house <S%H1004><s%> since <S%H4480><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I brought up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%> but have gone <S%H1961><s%> from tent <S%H4480><s%> <S%H168><s%> to <S%H413><s%> tent, <S%H168><s%> and from one tabernacle <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4908><s%> to another.

Wheresoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> I have walked <S%H1980><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> I a word <S%H1697><s%> to <S%H854><s%> any <S%H259><s%> of the judges <S%H8199><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> to feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H853><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> have ye not <S%H3808><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> me a house <S%H1004><s%> of cedars? <S%H730><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore thus <S%H3541><s%> shalt thou say <S%H559><s%> unto my servant <S%H5650><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> I <S%H589><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> thee from <S%H4480><s%> the sheepcote, <S%H5116><s%> even from <S%H4480><s%> following <S%H310><s%> the sheep, <S%H6629><s%> that thou shouldest be <S%H1961><s%> ruler <S%H5057><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

And I have been <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee whithersoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> thou hast walked, <S%H1980><s%> and have cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, and have made <S%H6213><s%> thee a name <S%H8034><s%> like the name <S%H8034><s%> of the great men <S%H1419><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are in the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Also I will ordain <S%H7760><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> for my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and will plant <S%H5193><s%> them, and they shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in their place, <S%H8478><s%> and shall be moved <S%H7264><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more; <S%H5750><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the children <S%H1121><s%> of wickedness <S%H5766><s%> waste <S%H1086><s%> them any more, <S%H3254><s%> as <S%H834><s%> at the beginning, <S%H7223><s%>

And since the time <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> judges <S%H8199><s%> to be over <S%H5921><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%> Moreover I will subdue <S%H3665><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> thine enemies. <S%H341><s%> Furthermore I tell <S%H5046><s%> thee that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will build <S%H1129><s%> thee a house. <S%H1004><s%>

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> thy days <S%H3117><s%> be expired <S%H4390><s%> that thou must go <S%H1980><s%> to be with <S%H5973><s%> thy fathers, <S%H1><s%> that I will raise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> thee, which <S%H834><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> of thy sons; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and I will establish <S%H3559><s%> <S%H853><s%> his kingdom. <S%H4438><s%>
He <S%H1931><s%> shall build <S%H1129><s%> me a house, <S%H1004><s%> and I will establish <S%H3559><s%> <S%H853><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>

I <S%H589><s%> will be <S%H1961><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> my son: <S%H1121><s%> and I will not <S%H3808><s%> take my mercy away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H2617><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> him, as <S%H834><s%> I took <S%H5493><s%> it from him that <S%H4480><s%> <S%H834><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee:

But I will settle <S%H5975><s%> him in mine house <S%H1004><s%> and in my kingdom <S%H4438><s%> forever: <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> and his throne <S%H3678><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> established <S%H3559><s%> forevermore. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>

According to all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> and according to all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> vision, <S%H2377><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> did Nathan <S%H5416><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> David. <S%H1732><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and sat <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> am I, <S%H589><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and what <S%H4310><s%> is mine house, <S%H1004><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thou hast brought <S%H935><s%> me hitherto? <S%H5704><s%> <S%H1988><s%>

And yet this <S%H2063><s%> was a small thing <S%H6994><s%> in thine eyes, <S%H5869><s%> O God; <S%H430><s%> for thou hast also spoken <S%H1696><s%> of <S%H5921><s%> thy servant's <S%H5650><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> for a great while to come, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7350><s%> and hast regarded <S%H7200><s%> me according to the estate <S%H8448><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> of high degree, <S%H4609><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>

What <S%H4100><s%> can David <S%H1732><s%> speak more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H5750><s%> to <S%H413><s%> thee for the honor <S%H3519><s%> of <S%H853><s%> thy servant? <S%H5650><s%> for thou <S%H859><s%> knowest <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy servant. <S%H5650><s%>

O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> for thy servant's sake, <S%H5668><s%> <S%H5650><s%> and according to thine own heart, <S%H3820><s%> hast thou done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> greatness, <S%H1420><s%> in making known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these great things. <S%H1420><s%>

O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> there is none <S%H369><s%> like thee, <S%H3644><s%> neither <S%H369><s%> is there any God <S%H430><s%> beside <S%H2108><s%> thee, according to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> we have heard <S%H8085><s%> with our ears. <S%H241><s%>

And what <S%H4310><s%> one <S%H259><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> is like thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to redeem <S%H6299><s%> to be his own people, <S%H5971><s%> to make <S%H7760><s%> thee a name <S%H8034><s%> of greatness <S%H1420><s%> and terribleness, <S%H3372><s%> by driving out <S%H1644><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thy people, <S%H5971><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> thou hast redeemed <S%H6299><s%> out of Egypt? <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%>

For <S%H853><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> didst thou make <S%H5414><s%> thine own people <S%H5971><s%> forever; <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> and thou, <S%H859><s%> LORD, <S%H3068><s%> becamest <S%H1961><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>

Therefore now, <S%H6258><s%> LORD, <S%H3068><s%> let the thing <S%H1697><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> and concerning <S%H5921><s%> his house <S%H1004><s%> be established <S%H539><s%> forever, <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> as <S%H834><s%> thou hast said. <S%H1696><s%>

Let it even be established, <S%H539><s%> that thy name <S%H8034><s%> may be magnified <S%H1431><s%> forever, <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> even a God <S%H430><s%> to Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and let the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> be established <S%H3559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee.

For <S%H3588><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> O my God, <S%H430><s%> hast told <S%H1540><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H241><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> that thou wilt build <S%H1129><s%> him a house: <S%H1004><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> hath found <S%H4672><s%> in his heart to pray <S%H6419><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee.

And now, <S%H6258><s%> LORD, <S%H3068><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art God, <S%H430><s%> and hast promised <S%H1696><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> goodness <S%H2896><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> thy servant: <S%H5650><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore let it please <S%H2974><s%> thee to bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H853><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of thy servant, <S%H5650><s%> that it may be <S%H1961><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee forever: <S%H5769><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> blessest, <S%H1288><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and it shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>
